item.title: In Europe, Instagram Ads Are About to Get Less Personal
item.description: The Facebook and Instagram owner faces pressure in Europe to ask before using data to target ads or train artificial intelligence.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on Vodafone, Infineon and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: When Did Apple's Notes App Become an Extension of Our Brains?
item.description: The simple iPhone app is a receptacle for nearly everything: passwords, grocery lists, baby-name brainstorms, the occasional ‘Vanderpump’ brain dump.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on MeridianLink, TSMC, Telus and more in the latest Market Talks covering the technology, media and telecom industries.

item.title: How ChatGPT Brought Down an Online Education Giant
item.description: Chegg’s stock has dropped 99% as students looking for help with homework defect to AI.
